00042     private FileOpener fileOpener;

00047     public Liquibase(String changeLogFile, FileOpener fileOpener, Database database) {
00048         log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00049 
00050         if (changeLogFile != null) {
00051             this.changeLogFile = changeLogFile.replace('\\', '/');  //convert to standard / if usign absolute path on windows
00052         }
00053         this.fileOpener = fileOpener;
00054 
00055         this.database = database;
00056     }
00057 
00058     public Database getDatabase() {
00059         return database;
00060     }
00061 
00065     public FileOpener getFileOpener() {
00066         return fileOpener;
00067     }
00068 
00073     public void setCurrentDateTimeFunction(String currentDateTimeFunction) {
00074         if (currentDateTimeFunction != null) {
00075             this.database.setCurrentDateTimeFunction(currentDateTimeFunction);
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     public void update(String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00080 
00081         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00082         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00083 
00084         try {
00085             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00086 
00087             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00088             changeLog.validate(database);
00089             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00090                     new ShouldRunChangeSetFilter(database),
00091                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00092                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00093 
00094             logIterator.run(new UpdateVisitor(database));
00095         } catch (LiquibaseException e) {
00096             throw e;
00097         } finally {
00098             try {
00099                 lockHandler.releaseLock();
00100             } catch (LockException e) {
00101                 log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Could not release lock", e);
00102             }
00103         }
00104     }
00105 
00106     public void update(String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00107         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00108         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00109         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00110 
00111         outputHeader("Update Database Script");
00112 
00113         update(contexts);
00114 
00115         try {
00116             output.flush();
00117         } catch (IOException e) {
00118             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00119         }
00120 
00121         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00122     }
00123 
00124     public void update(int changesToApply, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00125 
00126         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00127         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00128 
00129         try {
00130             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00131 
00132             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00133             changeLog.validate(database);
00134 
00135             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00136                     new ShouldRunChangeSetFilter(database),
00137                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00138                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database),
00139                     new CountChangeSetFilter(changesToApply));
00140 
00141             logIterator.run(new UpdateVisitor(database));
00142         } finally {
00143             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00144         }
00145     }

00147     public void update(int changesToApply, String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00148         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00149         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00150         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00151 
00152         outputHeader("Update "+changesToApply+" Change Sets Database Script");
00153 
00154         update(changesToApply, contexts);
00155 
00156         try {
00157             output.flush();
00158         } catch (IOException e) {
00159             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00160         }
00161 
00162         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00163     }
00164 
00165     private void outputHeader(String message) throws JDBCException {
00166         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("*********************************************************************");
00167         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment(message);
00168         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("*********************************************************************");
00169         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Change Log: " + changeLogFile);
00170         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Ran at: " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.SHORT, DateFormat.SHORT).format(new Date()));
00171         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Against: " + getDatabase().getConnectionUsername() + "@" + getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00172         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("LiquiBase version: " + LiquibaseUtil.getBuildVersion());
00173         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("*********************************************************************" + StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00174     }
00175 
00176     public void rollback(int changesToRollback, String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00177         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00178         database.setJdbcTemplate(new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database));
00179 
00180         outputHeader("Rollback " + changesToRollback + " Change(s) Script");
00181 
00182         rollback(changesToRollback, contexts);
00183 
00184         try {
00185             output.flush();
00186         } catch (IOException e) {
00187             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00188         }
00189         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00190     }
00191 
00192     public void rollback(int changesToRollback, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00193         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00194         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00195 
00196         try {
00197             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00198 
00199             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00200             changeLog.validate(database);
00201 
00202             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00203                     new AlreadyRanChangeSetFilter(database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00204                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00205                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database),
00206                     new CountChangeSetFilter(changesToRollback));
00207 
00208             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database));
00209         } finally {
00210             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00211         }
00212     }

00214     public void rollback(String tagToRollBackTo, String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00215         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00216         database.setJdbcTemplate(new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database));
00217 
00218         outputHeader("Rollback to '" + tagToRollBackTo + "' Script");
00219 
00220         rollback(tagToRollBackTo, contexts);
00221 
00222         try {
00223             output.flush();
00224         } catch (IOException e) {
00225             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00226         }
00227         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00228     }

00230     public void rollback(String tagToRollBackTo, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00231         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00232         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00233 
00234         try {
00235             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00236 
00237             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00238             changeLog.validate(database);
00239             
00240             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00241                     new AfterTagChangeSetFilter(tagToRollBackTo, database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00242                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00243                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00244 
00245             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database));
00246         } finally {
00247             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00248         }
00249     }

00267     public void rollback(Date dateToRollBackTo, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00268         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00269         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00270 
00271         try {
00272             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00273 
00274             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00275             changeLog.validate(database);
00276             
00277             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00278                     new ExecutedAfterChangeSetFilter(dateToRollBackTo, database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00279                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00280                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00281 
00282             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database));
00283         } finally {
00284             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00285         }
00286     }

00288     public void changeLogSync(String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00289 
00290         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00291         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00292         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00293 
00294         outputHeader("SQL to add all changesets to database history table");
00295 
00296         changeLogSync(contexts);
00297 
00298         try {
00299             output.flush();
00300         } catch (IOException e) {
00301             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00302         }
00303 
00304         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00305     }
00306 
00307     public void changeLogSync(String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00308         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00309         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00310 
00311         try {
00312             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00313 
00314             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00315             changeLog.validate(database);
00316 
00317             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00318                     new NotRanChangeSetFilter(database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00319                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00320                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00321 
00322             logIterator.run(new ChangeLogSyncVisitor(database));
00323         } finally {
00324             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00325         }
00326     }

00328     public void futureRollbackSQL(String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00329         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00330         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00331         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00332 
00333         outputHeader("SQL to roll back currently unexecuted changes");
00334 
00335         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00336         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00337 
00338         try {
00339             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00340 
00341             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00342             changeLog.validate(database);
00343 
00344             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00345                     new NotRanChangeSetFilter(database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00346                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00347                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00348 
00349             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database));
00350         } finally {
00351             database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00352             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00353         }
00354 
00355         try {
00356             output.flush();
00357         } catch (IOException e) {
00358             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00359         }
00360 
00361     }
00362 
00366     public final void dropAll() throws JDBCException, LockException {
00367         dropAll(getDatabase().getDefaultSchemaName());
00368     }
00369 
00373     public final void dropAll(String... schemas) throws JDBCException {
00374         try {
00375             LockHandler.getInstance(database).waitForLock();
00376 
00377             for (String schema : schemas) {
00378                 log.info("Dropping Database Objects in " + schema);
00379                 checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00380                 getDatabase().dropDatabaseObjects(schema);
00381                 checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00382                 log.finest("Objects dropped successfully");
00383             }
00384         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00385             throw e;
00386         } catch (Exception e) {
00387             throw new JDBCException(e);
00388         } finally {
00389             try {
00390                 LockHandler.getInstance(database).releaseLock();
00391             } catch (LockException e) {
00392                 log.severe("Unable to release lock: " + e.getMessage());
00393             }
00394         }
00395     }
00396 
00400     public void tag(String tagString) throws JDBCException {
00401         getDatabase().tag(tagString);
00402     }

00405     public void checkDatabaseChangeLogTable() throws JDBCException {
00406         getDatabase().checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00407         getDatabase().checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable();
00408     }
00409 
00416     public boolean isSafeToRunMigration() throws JDBCException {
00417         return !getDatabase().getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements() || getDatabase().getConnectionURL().indexOf("localhost") >= 0;
00418     }
00419 
00423     public DatabaseChangeLogLock[] listLocks() throws JDBCException, IOException, LockException {
00424         checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00425 
00426         return LockHandler.getInstance(getDatabase()).listLocks();
00427     }
00428 
00429     public void reportLocks(PrintStream out) throws LockException, IOException, JDBCException {
00430         DatabaseChangeLogLock[] locks = listLocks();
00431         out.println("Database change log locks for " + getDatabase().getConnectionUsername() + "@" + getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00432         if (locks.length == 0) {
00433             out.println(" - No locks");
00434         }
00435         for (DatabaseChangeLogLock lock : locks) {
00436             out.println(" - " + lock.getLockedBy() + " at " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance().format(lock.getLockGranted()));
00437         }
00438 
00439     }
00440 
00441     public void forceReleaseLocks() throws LockException, IOException, JDBCException {
00442         checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00443 
00444         LockHandler.getInstance(getDatabase()).forceReleaseLock();
00445     }

00447     public List<ChangeSet> listUnrunChangeSets(String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00448         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00449         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00450 
00451         try {
00452             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00453 
00454             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00455             changeLog.validate(database);
00456 
00457             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00458                     new ShouldRunChangeSetFilter(database),
00459                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00460                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00461 
00462             ListVisitor visitor = new ListVisitor();
00463             logIterator.run(visitor);
00464             return visitor.getSeenChangeSets();
00465         } finally {
00466             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00467         }
00468     }
00469 
00470     public void reportStatus(boolean verbose, String contexts, Writer out) throws LiquibaseException {
00471         try {
00472             List<ChangeSet> unrunChangeSets = listUnrunChangeSets(contexts);
00473             out.append(String.valueOf(unrunChangeSets.size()));
00474             out.append(" change sets have not been applied to ");
00475             out.append(getDatabase().getConnectionUsername());
00476             out.append("@");
00477             out.append(getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00478             out.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00479             if (verbose) {
00480                 for (ChangeSet changeSet : unrunChangeSets) {
00481                     out.append("     ").append(changeSet.toString(false)).append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00482                 }
00483             }
00484 
00485             out.flush();
00486         } catch (IOException e) {
00487             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00488         }
00489 
00490     }

00495     public void clearCheckSums() throws LiquibaseException {
00496         log.info("Clearing database change log checksums");
00497         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00498         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00499 
00500         try {
00501             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00502 
00503             UpdateStatement updateStatement = new UpdateStatement(getDatabase().getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabase().getDatabaseChangeLogTableName());
00504             updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("MD5SUM", null);
00505             getDatabase().getJdbcTemplate().execute(updateStatement);
00506             getDatabase().commit();
00507         } finally {
00508             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00509         }
00510     }

00512     public void generateDocumentation(String outputDirectory) throws LiquibaseException {
00513         log.info("Generating Database Documentation");
00514         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00515         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00516 
00517         try {
00518             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00519 
00520             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00521             changeLog.validate(database);
00522 
00523             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00524                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00525 
00526             DBDocVisitor visitor = new DBDocVisitor(database);
00527             logIterator.run(visitor);
00528 
00529             visitor.writeHTML(new File(outputDirectory), fileOpener);
00530         } catch (IOException e) {
00531             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00532         } finally {
00533             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00534         }
00535

00539 //            }

00547 //        }
00548     }

00553     public void validate() throws LiquibaseException {
00554 
00555         DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser().parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00556         changeLog.validate(database);
00557     }
